metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9745 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The parse_encoding function in type1/t1load.c in FreeType before 2.5.3allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a"broken number-with-base" in a Postscript stream, as demonstrated by8#garbage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.5
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.5').
